<style>
  :root { --ann-top: 56px; } /* JS 会覆盖为导航栏的真实高度 */

  /* —— 大横幅：原样但始终贴在导航栏正下方且水平居中 —— */
  .announcement-bar{
    position: fixed;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    top: var(--ann-top);
    z-index: 1050;

    /* 你的原始样式（非紧凑） */
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;           /* 内容居中 */
    align-items: center;
    gap: .6em;
    background: #eaf3ff;
    color: #07315c;
    font: 500 0.95rem/1.3 system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Arial, sans-serif;
    min-height: 44px;
    padding: .6em 1em;
    border: 1px solid #bfd9ff;
    border-radius: .5em;
    box-shadow: 0 1px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.08);
    max-width: 960px;
    width: calc(100% - 32px);          /* 两侧留 16px 呼吸 */
  }
  .announcement-bar a{
    color: #c46800; font-weight: 600; text-decoration: none;
  }
  .announcement-bar a:hover{ text-decoration: underline; }
  .announcement-bar .emoji{ font-size: 1.05em; }

  .announcement-bar .ann-close{
    position: absolute; right: 8px; top: 50%; transform: translateY(-50%);
    inline-size: 28px; block-size: 28px;
    border: 0; border-radius: 50%;
    background: transparent; color: inherit;
    font-size: 1.2rem; line-height: 1; cursor: pointer;
  }
  .announcement-bar .ann-close:hover{ background: rgba(0,0,0,.08); }

  /* —— 缩小版横条（关闭后显示），同样贴导航、居中 —— */
  .announcement-bar.minimized{
    cursor: pointer;
    min-height: unset;
    padding: .35em .8em;
    width: auto;
    max-width: 240px;
    box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.10);
    font-weight: 600;
  }
  .announcement-bar.minimized:hover{ background: #e0edff; }

  /* 深色模式 */
  @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark){
    .announcement-bar{
      background:#0e2742; color:#e6f0ff; border-color:#294b73;
      box-shadow: 0 2px 12px rgba(0,0,0,.45);
    }
    .announcement-bar a{ color:#ffb662; }
    .announcement-bar .ann-close:hover{ background: rgba(255,255,255,.10); }
    .announcement-bar.minimized{ background:#12375d; }
    .announcement-bar.minimized:hover{ background:#0e2742; }
  }

  /* 过渡 */
  @media (prefers-reduced-motion: no-preference){
    .announcement-bar{ transition: opacity .18s ease, transform .18s ease; }
  }
</style>

<script>
  (function(){
    const VERSION = '2025-08-28-v5';     // 文案更新时改版本号，所有用户会重新看到
    const KEY = 'announce:dismissed';
    const bar = document.getElementById('announce');
    const mini = document.getElementById('ann-toggle');

    // 计算导航栏高度，写入 CSS 变量，保证永远贴在下方
    function setAnnTop(){
      const nav = document.getElementById('quarto-header')
               || document.querySelector('header.navbar')
               || document.querySelector('.navbar.navbar-expand')
               || document.querySelector('header.site-header');
      const h = nav ? Math.round(nav.getBoundingClientRect().height) : 56;
      document.documentElement.style.setProperty('--ann-top', (h + 6) + 'px');
    }
    setAnnTop();
    window.addEventListener('resize', setAnnTop);

    // 初始显示逻辑
    try{
      const dismissed = localStorage.getItem(KEY);
      if (dismissed !== VERSION){ bar.hidden = false; mini.hidden = true; }
      else { bar.hidden = true; mini.hidden = false; }
    }catch(_){ bar.hidden = false; }

    // 关闭 -> 显示缩小条
    bar.querySelector('.ann-close').addEventListener('click', () => {
      bar.hidden = true;
      mini.hidden = false;
      try{ localStorage.setItem(KEY, VERSION); }catch(_){}
    });

    // 点击缩小条 -> 重新打开
    mini.addEventListener('click', () => {
      bar.hidden = false;
      mini.hidden = true;
      try{ localStorage.removeItem(KEY); }catch(_){}
    });

    // ESC 也能关闭
    bar.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape') bar.querySelector('.ann-close').click();
    });
  })();
</script>
